attributes.action: Get a new mandate to rule the country following the reisgnation of a Prime Minster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the resignation of a Prime Minster a general election should be called to get a new mandate to rule the United Kingdom.  This is based on the change of a leader of a political party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
